settings.title: Never run out of Grind coffee again.
settings.content_body: Our letterbox-friendly subscription makes sure you've got your coffee how you want it, when you want it. Skip, pause or cancel your subscription anytime, with no fuss. Get your next 3 orders with 20% off + a free Grind Refillable tin.

settings.subtitle_1: Our pods and packaging are compostable and plastic-free.
settings.subtitle_2: Our coffee is ethically sourced from sustainable farms around the world.
settings.subtitle_3: Subscribe to letterbox-friendly refills and never run out.

settings.contentBodyOne: If you're someone who starts your day with coffee, you know there's nothing worse than running out. With Grind, you can stop worrying and get your coffee how you want it, when you want it - delivered carbon positive through your letterbox. Personalise your regular delivery and never run out again.
settings.contentBodyTwo: Subscribe and get 20% off your next 3 orders, plus a free refillable Grind tin, when you use code GRIND20 at checkout.

settings.testimonialQuote: Lovely coffee, very easy that it just turns up on the doorstep so we never run out!"

settings.title: Roasted by Grind, in London.
settings.text:
Every one of our coffees is grown with care and traded with compassion. From¬†our London roastery, we source some of the best coffees in the world, and roast them to maximise flavour.

Most of our coffee goes out to our caf√©s across London, and we send the rest to our friends and subscribers around the world.

settings.title: Funded by our Customers.
settings.text:
We're an independent company based in Shoreditch, London - not an evil offshore empire. We're proud to pay our taxes in the UK, and to have created employment for more than 150 people¬†in London.

We¬†make long-term decisions,¬†putting sustainability and quality first,¬†and we're owned by our regulars, who have supported our growth through three record breaking rounds of crowdfunding.¬†

settings.title: Good days start with great coffee.
settings.content_body: What are you waiting for? Upgrade your morning with Grind at home.

settings.titleText: Win three months of coffee deliveries!
settings.bodyText: Winners will be selected monthly. We'll also share updates on what we're up to - including products, launches and dogs that we like.
